text: Spiderbait is an Australian rock band who have had two top ten albums and three albums reach the Australian top 40. Their song "Buy Me a Pony" was a defining song of Australian rock in the 90's and was #1 on the Triple J Hottest 100 for 1996. The group had success with their 2004 #1 Australian hit cover of "Black Betty". ==Other websites== * Spiderbait home page * Howlspace Spiderbait page * Spiderbait at The Dwarf Category:1980s music groups Category:1990s music groups Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:Australian hard rock bands Category:Post-hardcore bands Category:Punk bands Category:Australian alternative rock bands Category:Musical groups from New South Wales
title: Spiderbait
